But when Li'l D throws away Sunny's How To Do the To Do List the kids soon find that getting things done just might do them in.

programme.title: Class Of 3000 S1
programme.desc: When Philly Phil starts feeling like an outcast at Westley because of his poor performance in a Field Day event he transfers to a science magnet school. Missing their friend and feeling guilty for their role in making him feel unwanted the Westley kids have their work cut out for him when they try to woo him back. Meanwhile Luna is tired of being constantly upstaged by Sunny and vows to make the school think he's just as cool.

programme.desc: Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: GBRB: Joy Pops Laugh Pops
programme.desc: Forget about farming or cooking, the GBRB trio are heading overseas this time! Join them on the exciting and bumpy freestyle trip in Mexico.

programme.title: Chansung's Cooking
programme.desc: 2PM’s Chansung will explore different restaurants, taste popular menus and recreate them with his own recipes!

programme.title: Muscle Farmers
programme.desc: 5 'muscle farmers' land a helping hand to rural areas that face a labor shortage crisis. Join them in Korea's first agricultural-physical project as they enter the world of farming!

programme.title: Cha's Family
programme.desc: From Thailand to Japan, the cast explore bold local flavors, craft their own signature spicy sauce, and bring Korea’s passion for heat to a global stage—mixing food, culture, and adventure into one sizzling journey.

programme.title: Yumi's Cells
programme.desc: Adapted from the popular webtoon of the same title, it tells the story of an ordinary office worker Yumi through the eyes of her brain cells, which controlled her thoughts, feelings and actions.

programme.desc: The cast travels across South Korea, discovering unique culture, nature, magical places, and fascinating people. Each episode features different guests, joining in the joyful journey.

programme.title: The First Vampire
programme.desc: Vietnam's first ever vampire movie. In a modern fantasy world, five young women gather to compete for a life-changing opportunity, unaware of a bloodthirsty plan that awaits them.

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A special agent is force to protect his daughter from a far against biotech mutants.

programme.title: The Box
programme.desc: A music producer fallen from grace finds an artist who has everything needed to make it big and discovers the one thing holding him back, paralyzing stage fright.

programme.title: The Anchor
programme.desc: Se-Ra is a famous anchor on a broadcasting station. Five minutes before her news broadcast is to go live, she receives a phone call. The caller, Mi-So, tells Se-Ra: "I am going to be killed by someone. Please cover the story of my death."

programme.title: The Wall
programme.desc: An American sharpshooter engages in a deadly game of cat and mouse with an Iraqi sniper, who has him pinned behind a small chunk of concrete.

programme.title: Battle Of Jangsari
programme.desc: Depicts the diversion attack in Jangsari beach where 772 barely trained, young student soldiers were tossed into Korean war in order to pave the way for the Incheon Landing Operation

programme.title: No Mercy
programme.desc: A former champion martial artist struggles to find and seeks revenge on those responsible for her sister's disappearance.

programme.title: The Informer
programme.desc: Because of a failed drug bust, An FBI informant intentionally gets himself incarcerated again in order to infiltrate the mob at a maximum security prison

programme.title: Contorted
programme.desc: After tragedy, a family moves to a new house outside of the city, only to find the house was cheap due to unorthodox reasons.

programme.title: Wind River
programme.desc: A veteran hunter helps an FBI agent investigate the murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation.

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: A serial killer ruthlessly hunts down a deaf woman through the streets of South Korea after she witnesses his brutal crime.

programme.title: Show Dogs
programme.desc: Max, a macho, solitary Rottweiler police dog is ordered to go undercover as a primped show dog in a prestigious Dog Show, along with his human partner, to avert a disaster from happening.

programme.title: Cracked
programme.desc: Ruja inherited the painting from her deceased father and hired Tim, an art restorer to repair it, but they don't know that this invaluable art came with invaluable horror.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage
programme.desc: It takes patience and commitment for The Rhino Orphanage, as they nurture young rhinos whose mothers have been lost to poaching.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage
programme.desc: The two oldest rhinos are set to be released back into the wild. Three rhinos cause a stir as they go missing, while the younger rhinos make steady progress toward health and happiness.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage
programme.desc: The poaching crisis intensifies and poachers turn their attention to orphanages. After losing her mother, four-week-old Jamila finally finds sanctuary at The Rhino Orphanage.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: With days growing shorter and colder, Canadian wildlife is in a race against time, and any animal that fails to make the most of what autumn has to offer will perish.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Winter in Canada is both cruel and beautiful; in the grip of snow and ice, and animals are struggling; however, while some animals hunker down, others have babies to raise who need to adjust to their environment swiftly.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Spring is late this year, and when it finally arrives, the race is on to find a mate and start a family; black bears and beavers in the west, wood frogs in the south and 20,000 gannets in the east all have one thing on their minds.

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Summer is the season of plenty for most animals, but not polar bears; unable to hunt seals until the sea freezes over again, they grow hungrier by the day; for other animals summer is when youngsters must learn how to survive.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, the first animals had eyes that were unable to distinguish color -- yet as that changed, ‘seeing in color’ gave animals many advantages, whether to find food, attract a mate or warn off an enemy.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals some of the natural world’s most cunning tricksters and masters of disguise. Discover how some animals use color to hide and disappear into the background, or to trick and deceive.

programme.title: Attenborough's Life In Colour
programme.desc: Find out the stories behind the scientific research on animal colors - from robotic frogs wrestling with real-life counterparts, to spiders wearing eyeliner to attract mates.

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: Experience Namibia’s wild 1,000km coast! Where arid deserts meet stubborn life, this film captures a grandiose, fragile spectacle of nature thriving against all odds. Witness the impossible beauty!

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: From the Rockies to the Pacific, British Columbia is a jewel of biodiversity! Roam vast landscapes where the mighty grizzly bear reigns supreme. It’s a majestic, wild world waiting to be preserved!

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: Life finds a way! Blown by winds and washed ashore, the Caribbean is now a mesmerizing hotspot of global biodiversity. Explore these fragile, emerald ecosystems and their incredible island resilience.

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: Step back in time! Explore Queensland’s ancient wetlands and primary rainforests. Home to survivors of prehistoric eras, it’s a vibrant journey to the very origins of tropical Australia.

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: Small country, massive impact! Costa Rica hosts 5% of all Earth's species. Trek from peaks to shores to see why protecting this rich, living sanctuary is an absolute necessity for our planet.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: Meet the new wild warrior volunteers, as they are introduced to Imire’s extended animal family. Getting dirty is part of the job. And of course, there are always striking surprises at any moment.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episode, we witness a desperate mission to save a spooked impala. The intelligence of these anti poaching elephants astounds everyone. And, there is always time for fun tasks.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episoden the volunteers experience close up encounters with iconic creatures. Immersion into Imire’s anti-poaching efforts. And, nothing stands in the way of hard work.

programme.title: Fantastic Friends
programme.desc: In Saint Lucia, the twins crash Maisie’s getaway for a whirlwind of sailing adventures, jungle hikes, decadent chocolate massages, rum tastings, and endless tropical fun!

programme.title: Fantastic Friends
programme.desc: In Iceland, Bonnie teams up with the twins for an epic escape—whale watching, volcano trekking, horseback riding, and inspiring eco chats under the midnight sun.

programme.title: Fantastic Friends
programme.desc: In Dubai, Luke goes all out with adrenaline-packed dives, jetpacking thrills, golf swings, and speedboat races—then shares Potter memories over dinner…the loser picks up the tab!

programme.title: Fantastic Friends
programme.desc: In Poland, Sophie trades a calm weekend for a rush of adventure: trekking the towering Tatras, rafting wild rivers, uncovering a legendary salt mine, and so much more!

programme.title: Fantastic Friends
programme.desc: In Innsbruck, the twins whisk Haley to an alpine wonderland of skiing, bobsledding, après-ski drinks, and a magical trip down childhood stardom—plus a touch of witchcraft!

programme.title: Fantastic Friends
programme.desc: In Ireland, the twins join Evanna and her family for hurling matches, traditional dance, Potter nostalgia, and a spine-tingling countryside adventure!

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in his mum's home town of Beijing to begin a culinary, historical and personal journey through the ancient country of China.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam visits the beautiful, mountainous province of Anhui, home to one of the eight great regional cuisines of China. Anhui cuisine is hearty, peasant food that uses seasonal, wild produce from the mountains.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam's journey to explore China's history through its food continues, as he visits the provinces of Jiangsu and Zhejiang, both considered part of the 8 great regional cuisines of China and celebrated for their wealth and sophistication.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in one of the largest cities in the world Shanghai where he discovers a modern, cosmopolitan and global facing city.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: On his journey discovering China's history through its food, Adam arrives in Shandong - birthplace of Confucius and one of the oldest and most influential culinary traditions in China.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in one of the most fascinating Chinese provinces - Yunnan. Infused with spice and fragrance from Southeast and Central Asia, people from all around China have fallen in love with this cuisine and culture.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives to the fiery provinces of Sichuan and Hunan and this time he's joined by celebrated chef and author Fuchsia Dunlop who is an expert on the region.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw is in Fujian - a place with a long history of migration where the movement of people left an enduring mark that manifested in its food and culture.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw heads to the home of Cantonese cuisine - Hong Kong and Guangdong to discover the regional cuisine that spread to all corners of the world.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw's last stop is the very special Hainan Island - a balmy, tropical island and Adam's ancestral home.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: Singapore
programme.desc: Adam Liaw catches up with a cousin from his father's side of the family to learn how he has been making Hainanese chicken rice for over 30 years.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss searches for evidence that Tabitha's best friend is an Uncuddleable, but is sidetracked by a Templeton Family tradition: "The War of the Cheeks", a Go Fish tournament where the winner gets to make family rules for a whole day. When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Trying to win Tabitha's loyalty for Baby Corp, Boss and Tina invite her to Techy Tykes, a technology convention at their office. But when the top-secret UBO goes missing, the outsiders Tabitha and Tim (who's tagged along to relive his glory days) immediately become the number one suspects.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: The kids battle Shashi in Las Vegas as Shashi tries to take down evil billionaire Cleve and use Skeleton Key to create a new world order. Frostee has a plan to get Skeleton Key offline, but it only gives Tony ten seconds to take Shashi out and save the world.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Tony and his crew have been working as spy racers in LA for a while now and are itching to go international. Whey they discover a mysterious man with a strange tattoo of a formula in a smuggling ring bust, Ms. Nowhere finally agrees to let them go to Rio to investigate the tattoo and the whereabouts of one of her agents who has gone dark - Layla Gray.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Ms. Nowhere drops the kids off in Brazil and leaves to go on her own important mission, but things immediately go south for Tony and his crew. When the hauler and gear gets caught in quicksand, Tony needs to learn that a good leader knows when to accept help.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Dragon Knight
programme.desc: As our team floats in a boat to England, they are on their last legs. Po tells a story explaining the customs and traditions of Chinese New Year to elevate their spirits.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When The Croods experience the first-ever sugar-rush, they're hooked on the delicious new food; Grug is labeled a zombie after taking the first nap.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Thunk is so stinky he kills animals with his stench, he pretends to be a great hunter; A spider ant bite gives Grug the biggest brain in town.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: Liam starts acting even stranger when he falls in love with an older woman:15-year-old Cynthia. Birch, Sandra and Raffi conspire to give Liam a complete makeover to make him more appealing. Their plans backfire, making Liam look crazy instead of attractive.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: Sandra rises to the challenge of becoming a cheerleader, an act that stuns and mortifies her podmates. As Sandra succumbs to Amelia's ridiculous hazing rituals Pod 4 becomes increasingly uneasy. But we soon learn that Sandra is only doing back flips to ensure her nemesis' ultimate humiliation.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: Overhearing Mr. Towes' plan to throw a pop quiz Raffi uses the information to his advantage — by studying. However, Raffi's current obsession with texting has him including his own acronyms in his answers, thus creating irrefutable evidence for the teacher. Guilt finally undoes the pod with unlikely results.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: After a less than stellar day, Birch finds consolation in the pages of The Gemini Daily Planner she finds while cleaning her room. Impressed with its seeming accuracy, soon she won't make a move without consulting the book much to the escalating annoyance of the pod. A startling last-minute revelation keeps the pod from blowing apart.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Stingo is frustrated that he is always getting caught trying to take food from the other tots. He persuades the twins to go round the garden for him collecting food… will the other tots realise what he is up to?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Webby is clearing out her web. Fifi takes all the unwanted objects home and uses them to play a brilliant game of shadow puppets, a perfect game to play on a rainy day!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Primrose has decided to hold a party for Fifi. Everyone is helping get it ready, even Stingo and Slugsy who are in charge of making the cake. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi, Bumble and Violet are trying to pick all the blackberries before the wind blows them to the ground. But soon they have something very different to catch as Primrose flies past!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Slugsy is having trouble courting Primrose. Stingo's cousin Hornetto offers to help him. But could he be up to no good?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: It has snowed in Flowertot Garden and all the tots are having fun… except Primrose who is worried she'll get dirty. Can the other tots convince her to play with them?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Somebody has been going through the tots' bins every night in Flowertot Garden. The tots turn detective to see if they can discover who the culprit is.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Diggly has had enough of the heap of unwanted items next to his compost heap. Stingo decides to "resell" them to the other tots and unwittingly helps everybody out!

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: Olivia searches high and low for Grandma's missing time capsule, and eventually finds it tucked away, forgotten, in the attic. Olivia is puzzled and thrilled by the objects that she finds from Grandmother's childhood, and is inspired to create her own time capsule.

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: Olivia is determined to sell more Young Pioneers cookies than anybody else in her troupe – especially Francine. It turns out to be harder than she thought it would be, but with a little perseverance and ingenuity, Olivia manages to do her personal best.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag and Scooch break Gilber’s ancient Golden Slipper, they embark on an adventure to a secret cave to retrieve the matching slipper. \ For community outreach day, the Race Cadets are paired with an elderly resident of Pawston. It's Tag and Scooch's job to take old dog Leo around town for a day of slow, relaxing activities. But when Leo wants to kickbarx, row and skydive, Tag and Scooch try their best to keep up.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Rodney draws and writes his own comic book, TZG secretly helps him transport it to the comic book store where creator Ken KaBlam is on the hunt for new talent. / When Ken KaBlam gets homesick for his own hometown of Crostonburg, TZG secretly recreates the things me misses in Harmony Harbor.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Donna is dog sitting but unable to sleep due to barking, TZG secretly stops a skunk from sneaking into her yard at night and riling the pooch. / When an inexperienced Rona takes over as chairman of the Founder’s Day Celebration, TZG secretly helps ensure the traditional festivities run smoothly.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When the Dews find out their glitter guide (an older Dew Drop) is coming to visit, they bend over backwards to make a great first impression, but end up forgetting some of their responsiblities in the process. / When a string breaks on Marcus’ piano before his recital and he can’t practice, the Dews must lead Marcus to a new piano.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries
programme.desc: When the Dew Drops have the day off, they discover their families still need their help when they’re not around. / Harper needs a good night’s sleep before her first day of Cooking Camp. But when an overtired Nicholas keeps her awake, the Dews must help keep Nicholas quiet, even if it takes all night.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: Grug convinces The Croods to go on vacation, and they find a new family, The Broods, who live in a solitary utopia too good to be true/The Croods must escape and warn Ahhh! Valley before it's too late.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Gran moves into the cave with The Croods, she drives Grug nuts and embarrasses Eep in front of the first-ever group of cool kids.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: With his identity as a fugitive businessman exposed, Boss Baby has been hiding out in the lawless land of Canada. But he’s forced back into action over a new crisis with Baby Love: several criminals have copycatted Boss’s fugitive strategy, somehow turning themselves into babies to hide out from the law. While Tina works on exposing these new fake baby criminals to the world, Boss makes a dangerous journey across Canada to sneak back over the U.S. border.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After getting caught at the border, Boss, Tim, JJ, and Pip have to organize an escape from a “former novelty restaurant turned interrogation facility” using only the four phone calls they’ve been given. Meanwhile, Tina has a plan for Dez to infiltrate the criminal baby organization to break them up from the inside, but it’s complicated when Tina’s new assistant Temp Baby Aubrey accidentally takes over Dez’s undercover baby criminal role.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: After Heather is lured to the Northern Markets as a trap, Hiccup flies to find her, but when he arrives too late, Windshear is captured by Krogan

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Hiccup and his crew are in search for dragon eye gems only to discover a spy amongst them In the midst of it all Dagur has run into an old nemesis

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Pete the Polar Bear shows up for a vacation on MerCat’s sunny beach. Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats show Pete he can have a great vacation, even if things don’t go precisely to plan.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: Kitty Ranger Team Leader Mama Box helps Kitty Ranger Gabby and Pandy get a lost Baby Me-Owl back home to its Mama in the Fairy Tale Garden. They embark on a hiking adventure! They learn about animal tracking, earn patches along the way, and ultimately, reunite Baby with Mama!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.desc: A Shaolin warrior battles slave traders to stop his countrymen from being sold into bondage in the gold mines in America.

programme.desc: Martial artists join Red Lotus Flower Society to overthrow evil emperor. Governor hunts society members. Kung fu practitioner falls for merchant's daughter amid kung fu contest for her hand. Gender role reversal comedy ensues.

programme.desc: Two friends, ex Shaolin monks, part ways as they brush with the ongoing rebellion against the government. The ambitious one rises up to be a powerful military commander, while his betrayed friend resorts to learn the calm ways of Tai Chi.

programme.desc: Nostalgia aims to represent Chinese traditional culture by revealing life in villages in the way of story-telling. In this show, the audience can enjoy the natural and cultural backgrounds of Chinese traditional villages, and will find their knowledge of this oriental country expand through the interviews of Chinese people overseas whose memory and nostalgia can also reveal the very core value of the Chinese traditional culture.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: The Grey Men 2
programme.desc: Triad boss Song seeks to whitewash his image and seize Laika’s mayoral seat amid a regime change. He faces a funding shortfall despite colluding with officials, and gets his right-hand man and enforcer to commit crimes to boost his funds and power. Just as Song believes success is imminent, the dynamics between the three take an unexpected turn…

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: The Grey Men
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ah Shan goes undercover in prison to gain the trust of criminal Tian, in order to seek evidence against his gang. After their release from jail, Shan helps Tian rise within the gang and become the new boss. However, just as Shan successfully cracks down on the gang, he uncovers a shocking secret about Tian...

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Night Walk
programme.desc: Frank is framed for murder after his girlfriend is killed in a tragic incident during their visit to the Middle East. He is sent to a prison where he meets a Muslim inmate who helps him plan for a prison escape to prove his innocence. When his friend suddenly dies, can Frank successfully escape and seek justice for himself?

programme.title: RUTE:Toughness Redefined
programme.desc: The growing regional competition R U Tough Enough is searching for the toughest person from Southeast Asia. Join the search and meet some of the most mentally and physically strong individuals, leading up to an epic final showdown in Kuala Lumpur for the prize of US$15,000!

When his friend suddenly dies, can Frank successfully escape and seek justice for himself?

programme.title: RUTE:Toughness Redefined
programme.desc: The growing regional competition R U Tough Enough is searching for the toughest person from Southeast Asia. Join the search and meet some of the most mentally and physically strong individuals, leading up to an epic final showdown in Kuala Lumpur for the prize of US$15,000!

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: The Grey Men
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ah Shan goes undercover in prison to gain the trust of criminal Tian, in order to seek evidence against his gang. After their release from jail, Shan helps Tian rise within the gang and become the new boss. However, just as Shan successfully cracks down on the gang, he uncovers a shocking secret about Tian...

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.desc: Glenda (Jasmine Curtis-Smith) pursues comfort in virtual dating to make up for the lack of romance from her real-life partner. But what was meant to be make-believe may turn out to be a genuine connection.

programme.title: Girlfriend for Hire
programme.desc: A rich young man hires his classmate to pretend to be his girlfriend to appease his father. Though it is meant to be purely a business arrangement, real sparks fly as they spend time together.

programme.title: Sons of Nanay Sabel
programme.desc: After she was accused of being a negligent mother, Sabel's (Ai-ai delas Alas) wedding to Prince Harry was cancelled. To make things right, she embarks on a journey to find her estranged sons and reunite her family.

programme.title: Anong Ganap?
programme.desc: Being in on the entertainment circle is quick and easy on PBO's Anong Ganap? Presented by the gorgeous entertainment anchor ng bayan, Phoemela Baranda.

programme.title: Hustler
programme.desc: George is an excellent pool player and has in fact, established a reputation in the field of billiards. Later, he decided to take advantage of his talent and used the sport as a source of living.

programme.title: Status: Single
programme.desc: Rufa’s character is anxious to get married after her boyfriend dumps her and all her girlfriends get married one after the other. At 30, Doris can feel her biological clock ticking.

programme.title: Yung Libro Sa Napanood Ko
programme.desc: Lisa, a book author and Kim Gun Hoo, a Korean fan, meet and tour South Korea's towns together. As they spend more time with each other, Lisa eventually learns a past that apparently Gun Hoo was a big part of. Feeling confused and betrayed, Lisa disappears from his life again.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible S1 E17 - The Frame
programme.desc: After a tiny tape recorder explains the seemingly unachievable mission and self-destructs, the team goes into action, weaving elaborate schemes and wearing incredible disguises to foil the globe's worst criminals.

programme.title: The New Adventures of Wonder Woman E04 - The Bermuda Triangle Crisis
programme.desc: With the strength of Hercules, the wisdom of Athena, the speed of Mercury and the beauty of Aphrodite, she's Wonder Woman.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S5 E16 - Florence Meets Mr. Right
programme.desc: With his dry-cleaning business booming, George Jefferson moves his family--level-headed wife Louise and son Lionel to the upper east side. But life in a luxurious Manhattan high-rise holds unexpected pitfalls for George.

programme.title: Frasier S3 E17 - High Crane Drifter
programme.desc: In the third season of FRASIER additions to the recurring cast include Marta, Maris' maid and go-between, Frasier's son, Frederick, and Kate Costas, the headstrong, ratings-obsessed new manager of Frasier's home radio station KACL.

programme.title: Xena: Warrior Princess S1 E15 - Warrior… Princess
programme.desc: Xena, one of the fiercest, sexiest, most self-empowered women as she travels defending the innocent from the forces of darkness. She is the very definition of girl power.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S6 E17 - The Shower

programme.desc: Eldest son, John-Boy Walton, makes the family proud as he starts his first year in college, pursuing his dream of becoming a writer--a course that is both challenging and rewarding for John-Boy and the entire Walton family.Younger siblings Jason and Mary Ellen Walton discover the professions to which they will devote their lives in this heartwarming drama about growing up in the loving embrace of a large Appalachia family.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: The American frontier is rich with legends of Native Americans and outlaws, but also eerie tales of cursed mountains, monsters, and UFOs. Could these tales be true? Is the Wild West stranger than we think?

programme.title: The Pickers (S18)
programme.desc: For Mike and Jersey Jon, the deals are flying in a North Carolina garage. Meanwhile, Danielle and Robbie uncover the celebrated history of a legendary Kentucky hotel.

programme.title: Hidden Cities (S2)
programme.desc: 8 powerful kingdoms and 51 kings. Find out how she succeeded in being the only Southeast Asian country to remain independent throughout her history.

programme.title: Mysteries Unearthed With Danny Trejo (S1)
programme.desc: From a Revolutionary War-era ship hiding under Manhattan to a sprawling Roman villa unearthed in the backyard of a home. The structures uncovered in this episode lead to more questions than answers.

programme.title: The Death Coast
programme.desc: After finding an American coin at Le Chameau's wreck site, Jeff MacKinnon must choose to either—stay the course or chase a new mystery.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S4)
programme.desc: It's the unsolved air piracy case in history. A man hijacks a Northwest Orient Airlines flight, demanding 4 parachutes and $200,000. He jumps off the plane with the money and is never seen again.

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: While drilling into the Mesa on Skinwalker Ranch, the team makes a shocking discovery.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S16)
programme.desc: Along the Earth's north 37th parallel, there have been so many reports of UFO's that it has been dubbed The UFO Superhighway. Is there something about this latitude attracting extraterrestrial visitors?

programme.title: Swamp People: Serpent Invasion (S3)
programme.desc: Troy Landry and Pickle witness just how far the pythons have spread. Bill and Tess tackle some uninvited guests, while Dusty does what he can to prevent an early end to his python season.

programme.title: Clash Of The Titans
programme.desc: In CLASH OF THE TITANS, the ultimate struggle for power pits men against kings and kings against gods. But the war between the gods themselves could destroy the world. Sam Worthington (Terminator Salvation, Avatar) stars as the Greek hero Perseus in this spectacular retelling of the classic myth (and '80s cult classic film). Born of a god, but raised as a man, Perseus is helpless to save his family from the clutches of Hades (Oscar nominee Ralph Fiennes -- Harry Potter films), the vengeful god of the underworld. With nothing left to lose, he volunteers to lead a dangerous mission to defeat Hades before he can seize power from Zeus (Oscar nominee Liam Neeson -- Batman Begins) and unleash hell on earth. With a daring band of warriors, Perseus sets off on a perilous journey deep into forbidden worlds. Battling unholy demons and fearsome beasts, he will triumph only if he can accept his power as a god, defy his fate and create his own destiny.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 1
programme.desc: Old rivals come out smokin' in an attempt to uncover some unique finds. When Jesse tries to bump off Brandon and Lori, will he score high or strike out? With the other hunters battling, Scott and Chrissy ride in and sweep up some bargains before thedust settles.

programme.title: Smallville S1 7
programme.desc: Clark must save Pete from being literally devoured by a female classmate, Jodi Melville, whose diet of Kryptonite-affected vegetables causes her to shed weight faster than she can handle.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 8
programme.desc: Michael mystifies laundromat patrons by impossibly multiplying miniscule amounts of detergent, and makes one man's day when he convinces him that he's hit the coin machine jackpot. Then at a thrift store, Michael taps into his musical abilities by turning into a human record player. Plus, as an employee at a shipping store, he astonishingly flips a full bowl of punch without spilling a drop and repeatedly teleports a glass penguin to one customer's dismay.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 9
programme.desc: Michael confuses wine drinkers with an incredible shrinking bottle, and a supposedly deep cork that defies the laws of physics. Then, he bedazzles a jewelry store patron with disappearing diamonds. Later, he heads to the carwash where one woman takesa stand when her "go green" clean takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 7
programme.desc: This hour, the joke's on you... and on 20 of the World's Dumbest Pranksters. Their tricks include everything from a terrifying wake up call, to telekinesis, and a not-so-dead body in the trunk of a taxi. With real jokes provided by our cast of hilarious comedians, including Mike Trainor, Chris Fairbanks, and Katlyn Carlson.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 1
programme.desc: Old rivals come out smokin' in an attempt to uncover some unique finds. When Jesse tries to bump off Brandon and Lori, will he score high or strike out? With the other hunters battling, Scott and Chrissy ride in and sweep up some bargains before thedust settles.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 01
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin put their hacking skills to the test as they find out which hacks work best for removing pet hair, grilling without charcoal, and opening a wine bottle without a bottle opener. Plus, they'll uncover the best pool party hacks, and craft a hack-filled defense against the rugged outdoorsman.

programme.title: Container Wars S2 3
programme.desc: A mysterious container from Guam has the competition ready for battle. Manic Matt fires a warning shot, but the Israelis aren't backing down. Will this enormous gamble pay off? Or will the container's questionable contents backfire?

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 2
programme.desc: Q, Sal, Murr and Joe use a two-way mirror to get each other to crack and then hit a grocery to see who can sell the most samples. Plus, the loser gets taken for a ride that ends with a visit to the Statue of Liberty.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 3
programme.desc: Sal, Joe, Murr and Q get stuck in a grocery showdown, beg strangers for questionable quotes, and spew financial tips that are anything but sound. Plus, the loser earns a time-out for his outrageous antics at a kid's play space.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 3
programme.desc: With Sean as the captain, the biggest of the big-time bidders head to Marina Del Rey in search of true nautical treasures. In one of the most explosive episodes to date, Scott and Brandon test each others jibs. Only one can swim - the other must sink!

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 4
programme.desc: Things get hairy for the hunters as some ring in the money while others go for broke. Desert Dan returns to turn up the heat as T Money continues to march to the beat of his own drum. In a quest to protect their territory, Brandon and Lori go to battle for a bin that could prove to be their most profitable yet.

programme.title: Smallville S1 8
programme.desc: Clark and Lex team up to rescue members of Clark's high school class after a janitor, Earl Jenkins (TONY TODD), takes them hostage in LuthorCorp's Smallville Fertilizer Plant No. 3.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 10
programme.desc: Michael Carbonaro is a magician by trade, but a prankster by heart. In The Carbonaro Effect, Michael performs baffling tricks on unsuspecting people in everyday situations, all caught on hidden camera.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S1 11
programme.desc: Michael Carbonaro is a magician by trade, but a prankster by heart. In The Carbonaro Effect, Michael performs baffling tricks on unsuspecting people in everyday situations, all caught on hidden camera.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 2
programme.desc: Q, Sal, Murr and Joe use a two-way mirror to get each other to crack and then hit a grocery to see who can sell the most samples. Plus, the loser gets taken for a ride that ends with a visit to the Statue of Liberty.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 3
programme.desc: Sal, Joe, Murr and Q get stuck in a grocery showdown, beg strangers for questionable quotes, and spew financial tips that are anything but sound. Plus, the loser earns a time-out for his outrageous antics at a kid's play space.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 8
programme.desc: Put Thomas Edison to shame with 20 of the World's Smartest Inventions - from a bird feeder with a shocking high-voltage surprise, to a bowl made entirely of bacon, and a whacky way to grow bananas at home. With innovative commentary from our cast ofhilarious comedians, including Mike O'Gorman, Jared Logan and Judy Gold.

programme.title: Hack My Life S1 02
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin take hacking to the next level as they determine which hacks work best for combatting spicy foods, peeling potatoes, and keeping the mirror from fogging up after a shower. Plus, they'll reveal the best camping hacks, and see if a fork made from a pencil really does the trick.

programme.title: Container Wars S2 4
programme.desc: The mother lode of all containers makes landfall. Jason and Matt go all in, but will their hunches pay off? Or will beauty queen Deana's fashion sense reel in the ultimate score? A surprise twist could change every rule in the book.

programme.title: Smallville S1 8
programme.desc: Clark and Lex team up to rescue members of Clark's high school class after a janitor, Earl Jenkins (TONY TODD), takes them hostage in LuthorCorp's Smallville Fertilizer Plant No. 3.

programme.title: Smallville S2 5
programme.desc: Clark becomes concerned when a mysterious poet, Byron Moore (SEAN FARIS), leaves love notes for Lana at her parents' grave. Clark warns her to stay away from Byron, but she is intrigued.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 16
programme.desc: While the guys try to give their significant others the perfect Valentine’s Day, Raj and Stuart throw a lonely people party at the comic book store.

programme.desc: When a deadly secret resurfaces, five friends are stalked by a vengeful killer.

programme.desc: A petty thief aspires to become a member of the notorious Axe Gang during the 1940s in Canton, China.

programme.title: Elsbeth (Season 2)
programme.desc: While investigating a death, Elsbeth finds herself fencing with Lawrence Grey.

programme.desc: Danny and Lena’s investigation into a robbery gone wrong quickly turns personal, pushing Lena to devise a bold plan that tests Mae’s boundaries. Meanwhile, Sean and Jonah face rising tensions with Boston’s firefighters, and Sarah clashes with boyfriend Seth over family discipline.

programme.desc: The Fly Team works to locate missing aid workers and the people who kidnapped them.

programme.desc: John Nolan, the oldest rookie in the LAPD, has used his life experience, determination and sense of humor to keep up with rookies 20 years his junior. programme.title: F9 The Fast Saga
programme.desc: The true meaning of family gets tested like never before as Dom Toretto takes the team on a worldwide ride with high-stakes action, old friends and a surprising new foe.

programme.title: Sky High & Super Fun Adventures
programme.desc: JJ's on a sky-high adventure! He blasts off to the moon, trains as a firefighter & chases a lost balloon!

programme.title: JJ Sings & Dances to Classic Rhymes!
programme.desc: JJ dances to classic rhymes! He sings "Hey Diddle Diddle," helps Humpty Dumpty & rocks out to "Rockabye Baby"!

programme.title: Big Surprises on the Farm!
programme.desc: There are big surprises on the farm! Ella & Bee find a mysterious tortoise egg & meet new tiger twin friends!

programme.title: Let's All Help Each Other!
programme.desc: Let's all help each other on the farm! The friends build a bird feeder, cheer up a sad horse & share veggies!

programme.title: Races, Games & Helping Friends!
programme.desc: It's a day of competitions & helping friends! The crew races in an obstacle course & rescues a cute kitten!

programme.title: A Fun Day of Games & Construction
programme.desc: It's a day of games & fun! The crew builds a crazy golf course & has a silly sandcastle competition!

programme.title: When Everything Goes Hilariously Wrong!
programme.desc: Everything goes hilariously wrong! Robot gets stuck in jelly & Princess Cat's castle fills with bubbles!

programme.title: The Ultimate Teamwork & Rescue Special!
programme.desc: It's a teamwork & rescue special! Kii & Yii save Princess Cat from a well & from her out-of-control plane!

programme.title: Underwater Problems & Clever Fixes
programme.desc: It's a day of clever fixes! The Sharksons fix a broken backpack & make a night light to help Grub sleep!

programme.title: Underwater Learning Adventures!
programme.desc: It's an underwater learning adventure! The Sharksons sing the ABCs, learn colors & brush their shark teeth!

programme.title: A Big Day of Discovery & Play!
programme.desc: It's a day of discovery with Twinkle! She makes music with toadstools & plays "Twinkle Says" with her friends!

programme.desc: TBA

programme.title: Night Watch
programme.desc: After a car accident erases his memory, Wang Ren Jie takes on a job as a night guard. As the clock strikes midnight, he reports for duty at the abandoned building, only to find three lost souls awaiting him, and unravels a revenge plot at the same time. Is this fate or a curse cast by vengeful spirits?

programme.title: Inside The Boys
programme.desc: Adapted from a true paranormal event, it is said that people working in the morgue at midnight encounter haunted events as many dead bodies are kept in the college hospital. When a few medical students experience a series of horrifying incidents after leaving the morgue at midnight, the campus is shrouded in terror.

programme.title: Hollow
programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimer’s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughter’s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to begin…

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jing Wen, a struggling drama student, takes on a modelling job to help cover her tuition costs. As she becomes a model for an enigmatic artist specializing in expressive human body sketches, Jing Wen accidentally uncovers a shocking truth, plunging her into a desperate fight for survival.

programme.title: Lost Memories
programme.desc: As a young mother grapples with her daughter's mysterious disappearance, a series of eerie events unfold. These events could be linked to the vengeful ghosts of a tragic accident that happened 20 years ago...

programme.title: Dead in the Water
programme.desc: When aspiring photography vlogger Tara gets dumped by her long term boyfriend, her best friend Amy takes her on a weekend getaway to her family's vacation lake house. It is there that they encounter a mysterious and charming man who forces them to face their demons.

programme.title: Bad Blood
programme.desc: A social worker takes a withdrawn homeless boy into her care, not suspecting that he is a vampire. As she gets closer to him, his thirst for human blood increases and to protect him, she must help lure his next kill to satisfy his cravings.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Si Nan and her husband travel to Kuala Lumpur for a vacation to relieve her pregnancy stress. However, she soon uncovers his evil plan to turn their child into a 'Luk Krok' for profit, which puts her in grave danger. With the help of the hotel ghosts, she manages to flee and alert the police to arrest him, finally giving birth to her child.

programme.title: Chapter 1 Mae Nak Reborn
programme.desc: Mae Nak the ghost wife returns to take revenge for a pregnant woman who is sexually assaulted and loses her baby. No one can identify the assailant except Mae Nak, who turns into an evil spirit in order to punish the assailant for his evil deeds.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: During a routine undercover prostitution sting, Columbus Vice Detective Andrew Mitchell shoots and kills 23-year-old Donna Dalton Castleberry.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Murder In The Bayou
programme.desc: When the supposed great-niece of Marilyn Monroe, Krystal Jean Baker, 13, is found dead beneath a bridge in Texas' Bayou Country, investigators are stumped.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2)
programme.desc: When a 70-year-old grandmother passes away suspiciously on a road trip, investigators uncover a sinister murder plot while searching for her remains.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2)
programme.desc: 26-year-old Timothy 'Rambo' Ramsey is killed in a drive-by shooting, but the investigation yields little evidence, and the case goes cold for six years.

programme.title: Hoarders (S15)
programme.desc: Bob spent a fabulous career as a successful artist painting and drawing for department store advertising, where his work caught the attention of many celebrities.

programme.title: Women On Death Row
programme.desc: Melissa Lucio was sentenced to death for the murder of her two-year-old daughter, Mariah, and in January 2022 she was given an official execution date of April 27, 2022.

programme.title: City Confidential (S9)
programme.desc: Spring Valley's Haitian community is rocked when a civic leader is murdered. It takes police nearly two decades to sift through the rumours and solve a mystery filled with lies and dark secrets.

programme.title: Partners In Crime (S2)
programme.desc: Top forensic pathologist Dr. Mun'Im Idris helps Indonesian police solve a child serial killing and the decapitation of a businesswoman.

programme.title: Partners In Crime (S2)
programme.desc: Forensic audio expert Prof Zhang Cuiling shows how voices on a recorded conversation or a threatening phone call can be revealing.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Arthur Shawcross tells a lot of stories about his life before he began to kill. He might have been known for killing women along Rochester's Genesee River, but his first murder was years earlier.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A woman is stalked in her apartment; a man stops a carjacking by using an unusual weapon against his attackers; a convenience store clerk uses his martial arts training to stave off a robber; and more.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A gas station worker faces down the barrel of a gun and is ordered to empty her registers; a man running an errand goes on a high speed chase to elude carjackers.

programme.title: Preschool | Eccd
programme.desc: Learn about the concept of size, length, weight, time, and money. Study how children can take care of themselves and understand the objects in the environment and their attributes.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: Learn about the concept of size, length, weight, time, and money. Study how children can take care of themselves and understand the objects in the environment and their attributes.

programme.title: Grade 1 Language
programme.desc: Pag-aralan ang konsepto ng pagbabaybay, panghalip, pangngalan, salitang naglalarawan, at ang pagtukoy ng sariling ideya at opinyon tungkol sa napakinggang kuwento.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: Know more about fractions 1⁄2 and 1/4, 2-dimensional and 3-dimensional figures, as well as continuous and repeating patterns and mathematical sentences.

programme.title: Grade 1 Reading & Literacy
programme.desc: Learn about polite expressions and how to talk about oneself, one’s family and one’s personal experiences.

programme.title: Grade 1 Makabansa
programme.desc: Unawain ang kahalagahan ng pagkilala ng mga batayang impormasyon ng pisikal na kapaligiran sa sariling paaralan at ng mga taong bumubuo rito para sa paghubog ng kakayahan ng bawat mag-aaral.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Matuto tungkol sa pangngalan, panghalip, salitang magkatugma, salitang naglalarawan, at pagbabaybay, pati na rin ang iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento at ang pag-uugnay ng sarili sa tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: Study how to divide whole numbers up to 1000 including money and unit fractions. Learn more about straight and curved lines, flat and curved surfaces, and basic shapes and continuous patterns using two attributes.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: Discover what are word clines, synonyms, and antonyms. Identify major points and key themes in a story, and the difference between what is made-up and real in texts.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Alamin ang kahalagahan ng mabuting paglilingkod ng mga namumuno sa pagsulong ng mga pangunahing hanapbuhay at pagtugon sa pangangailangan ng mga kasapi ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Pag-aralan ang tambalang salita, pandiwa, pang-abay, at pang-ukol. Alamin kung paano magbigay ng sariling ideya, hinuha, pangunahin at sumusuportang kaisipan, tungkol sa kuwentong napakinggan.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: Identify which fractions are proper and improper, similar and dissimilar and equivalent. Learn more about lines and symmetrical designs, continuous and repeating patterns, and mathematical sentences involving multiplication and division of whole numbers.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: Study what are homonyms, homographs, and hyponyms. Know more about the elements of a story, how to write it, and how to compare and contrast its information, alongside learning about words, phrases, and sentences with long vowels.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Unawain at pahalagahan ang pagkakakilanlang kultural ng kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: Discover how objects perform motion, and learn about the source of light, sound, heat and electricity, along with their uses.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Alamin kung paano magsuri at maghambing ng iba't ibang uri ng panitikan, kung ano ang mga estratehiya sa pagkuha ng impormasyon, paano wastong gamitin ang impormal na komunikasyon, at ang angkop na ekspresyon sa pagbabahagi ng ideya o opinyon tungkol sa mga tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: Identify the key concepts of axiomatic structure of geometry and triangle congruence.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: Examine what are biases, propagandas, parallelism, and cohesive devices in different types of speech.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Aralin ang naging transpormasyon tungo sa makabagong panahon ng mga bansa at rehiyon sa daigdig bunsod ng paglaganap ng mga kaisipan sa agham, politika, at ekonomiya tungo sa pagbuo ng pandaigdigan kamalayan.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: Learn more about the particle nature of matter as a basis for explaining properties, physical changes, and structure of substances and mixtures. Discover how to identify a substance according to its atomic structure, and how to use the periodic table of elements to organize and determine the chemical properties of elements.

programme.title: Als
programme.desc: Learn about the process of planning, setting up, running a small business, and entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Matuto tungkol sa wastong paggamit ng pang-angkop, pangatnig, salitang may lapi, at iba't ibang uri ng pangungusap. Alamin kung paano magbigay ng lagom, pagsusuri ng pahayag, at kumuha ng impormasyon sa tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: Understand the nature of solid figures, sequences in forming rules, expressions and equations. Learn more about rate and speed, and of area and surface area of plane and solid or space figures.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: Know how to present reports of differing viewpoints and how to evaluate narratives.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Alamin kung paano unawain at pahalagahan ang pagpupunyagi ng mga Pilipino tungo sa pagtugon sa mga suliranin, isyu at hamon ng kasarinlan.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: Learn more about gravity, friction and how they affect movement of objects, alongside how energy is transformed in simple machines.

programme.title: Grade 9 Science
programme.desc: Know more about the volcanoes found in the Philippines, the factors that affect climate, the effects of changing climate, and how to adapt accordingly. Discover the relationship between the constellations in the sky and Earth's position along its orbit.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: L'Avenir Nous Appartient
programme.desc: Sophie Pregent talks about how she became involved in trade unionism; emilie discovers the principles behind the liberated company; Monic visits staff at Poche et Fils after the company implemented a four-day week with no loss of salary.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Le Point
programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: Ils Vecurent Heureux
programme.desc: Don Jose is jealous and very rigid. Carmen is seductive and very free. A combination that's not always easy to live with, especially when temptation is everywhere.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Les Amants De Brasmort
programme.desc: Brasmort is a barge cemetery. This is where Jean, a down-and-out sailor, and Monique, the daughter of a very rich shipowner, declare their love for each other. But they will need courage to face up to all that separates them.

programme.title: Ya Benti
programme.desc: Sabrina, lesbian, is about to marry Younes, her childhood friend, who is also gay. A marriage that suits both of them because it reassures and delights their families. But on the eve of the ceremony, Sabrina begins to have doubts.

programme.title: Fraiche
programme.desc: At the age of 58 and at the head of a literary programme on the radio, Anne leads a settled and peaceful family life. Until the day she attacks a young woman with incredible violence simply because she offers Anne her seat on the metro.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: While enjoying a thalasso stay offered by his colleagues, Commissioner Watson discovers a couple electrocuted in one of the jacuzzis.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: Investigators discover that the victims were not who they claimed to be, using multiple identities across the territory. Did the killer target the impostors or the impersonated?

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes
programme.desc: International relations analysed using geography maps, which are vital to understanding the world in which we live and the challenges it presents.

programme.title: Le Premier Venu
programme.desc: Gina and her fiance have been engaged for ages, but just before their wedding he breaks off without warning, leaving her inconsolable. Her best friend advises her to turn the page with the first man she meets. Will Felicien, the opposite of Gina in every respect, manage to surprise her?

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: 64' Actu
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. Economics, social debates, international news: the expertise of our journalists. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: 64' Debat
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What it's all about: the guests take an in-depth look at a key issue. Increased focus on Francophone cultural news, with dedicated sequences. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: L'Invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: Le Point
programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Version Francaise
programme.desc: Passionate about French chic, ambassadress Katherina Marx surrounds herself with major figures from the worlds of fashion, design, gastronomy, and fine living. Each episode features an iconic guest and a series of special reports, allowing viewers to discover or rediscover France, its young designers, and its chic and trendy hang-outs.

programme.title: Chroniques D'En Haut
programme.desc: The Paulin brothers grew up in Le Reposoir, a small village nestled in the heart of the Aravis, and each chose his own way to live the mountain to the extreme. One walks barefoot on a slackline stretched between two dizzying points, the other climbs the most demanding faces of the Mont-Blanc massif.

programme.title: Le Journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: L'Actu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Actu
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. Economics, social debates, international news: the expertise of our journalists. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: 64' Debat
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What it's all about: the guests take an in-depth look at a key issue. Increased focus on Francophone cultural news, with dedicated sequences. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: L'Invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: C Dans L'Air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: C'Est Du Belge
programme.desc: In the company of Gerald Watelet, focus on the best ambassadors of Belgian culture and heritage, on the behind-the-scenes of unmissable events and portraits of personalities making the news.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Yellowstone, De Neige Et De Fumees
programme.desc: The Yellowstone National Park region contains half of the world's geysers and hot springs. The result: a breathtaking landscape. Tanguy Dumortier meets photographer Michel d'Oultremont there and observes pronghorns, moose, and a gigantic herd of elk...

programme.title: C'Est Succulent !
programme.desc: Leïla Albert interviews Philippe Frenoi, world champion welsh rarebit and chips fan. Together they prepare the dish that crowned him champion: a welsh rarebit revisited with pulled pork, served with chips.

programme.title: Version Francaise
programme.desc: The Cite du vitrail in Troyes traces almost ten centuries of history. In Paris, textile artist Aude Franjou's linen sculpture has taken up position inside the July Column on Place de la Bastille. In a theatrical spirit, Palomo Spain blurs genres. Meet artist and cabinetmaker Maxim, creator of the Oodelally workshop.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: C'Est Succulent !
programme.desc: Leïla Albert interviews Philippe Frenoi, world champion welsh rarebit and chips fan. Together they prepare the dish that crowned him champion: a welsh rarebit revisited with pulled pork, served with chips.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Yellowstone, De Neige Et De Fumees
programme.desc: The Yellowstone National Park region contains half of the world's geysers and hot springs. The result: a breathtaking landscape. Tanguy Dumortier meets photographer Michel d'Oultremont there and observes pronghorns, moose, and a gigantic herd of elk...

programme.title: C'Est Du Belge
programme.desc: In the company of Gerald Watelet, focus on the best ambassadors of Belgian culture and heritage, on the behind-the-scenes of unmissable events and portraits of personalities making the news.

programme.title: Bestioles & Cie
programme.desc: Whether it's a lake, tree or field, there are always a host of mini-creatures. Often feared, because unknown, we discover just how fascinating they are as we take an immersive visit into their world. Often, and wrongly, underestimated, they play an essential role in the natural cycle of life.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Le Petit Geek
programme.desc: What exactly does an influencer do? How do you create a video game? Why are screens dangerous, and what about digital identities? In each episode children shed light on today's virtual world.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Beh Buti Nga ep 11
programme.desc: After making a fortune from Bitcoin, Axel gets back at the girls who once broke his heart. When he succeeds, he makes it a mission to help his high school barkada to become confident heartbreakers. However, things take a turn when Isabelle their only female friend in high school starts forming a bond with Axel and he falls in love with her for real.

programme.title: Team A S1 ep 7
programme.desc: Janet and Ian started a simple life together, but will their maried life be as happy as they dreamed to be when both their parents treat each other as enemy?

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 23
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Osyana ep 6

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 9
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 61
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together.
